-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Simple parser for LISP S-expressions
--   
--   A simple parser for LISP S-expressions, using Parsec.
--   
--   This comes from Jonathan Tang's tutorial, <i>Write Yourself a Scheme
--   in 48 Hours</i>.
@package lispparser
@version 0.3.1

module Text.ParserCombinators.Parsec.Lisp
parseExpr :: Parser LispVal
data LispVal
Atom :: String -> LispVal
List :: [LispVal] -> LispVal
DottedList :: [LispVal] -> LispVal -> LispVal
Number :: Integer -> LispVal
String :: String -> LispVal
Bool :: Bool -> LispVal
instance Read LispVal
instance Show LispVal
instance Eq LispVal
